mapper.select: select rw.date as weekDate, w.minutes, p.name as projectName, t.name as typeName from week_project_time_count w left join project p on w.project = p.id left join type t on p.type = t.id inner join record_week rw on w.week_id = rw.id where rw.date between #{startDate} and #{endDate} order by rw.date desc
